description: Floating IPs API extension should return a dict for its show action, to match the general pattern seen in the hosts extension.
title: Floating IPs API extension should return a dict for show action

comments.content: Floating IPs API extension should return a dict for its index action, to match the general pattern seen in the hosts extension.
